name: Schon nach wenigen Tagen! ... Einigkeit! LCCN2004666114 - from Commons

desc.html: English:  Title: Schon nach wenigen Tagen! ... Einigkeit! Abstract: Poster lists achievements since the end of the war: a people's republic; freedom of assembly, press and religion; hereditary privileges and dynasties swept away; militarism smashed; an eight hour work day; etc. Text declares that much has been achieved yet much remains to be accomplished, and tells people to close ranks and to show solidarity. Physical description: 1 print (poster) : lithograph, color ; 70 x 47 cm. Notes: Forms part of: Rehse-Archiv für Zeitgeschichte und Publizistik.; Bernhard.; Title from item.
